issue.title: Please delete old releases from mirroring system
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1065](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1065). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To reduce the load on the ASF mirrors, projects are required to delete old releases [1]

Please can you remove all non-current releases?

Thanks!

[1] http://www.apache.org/dev/release.html#when-to-archive
